name: Magic Broom
subtitle: Swift Cleaner
author: Cristian Romero

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: What cards are shuffled back into the deck by the Clean This, Clean That ability of Magic Broom – Swift Cleaner?
A: A Broom card is any card that has “Broom” in its classifications.

rules_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) CLEAN THIS, CLEAN THAT When you play this character, you may shuffle all Broom cards from your discard into your deck.
